entry.tran: （政策、讲话或想法的）要旨，主题，基调
entry.def: The keynote of a policy, speech, or idea is the main theme of it or the part of it that is emphasized the most.

example.ex: He would be setting out his plans for the party in a keynote speech...
example.tran: 他将在其主旨发言中阐述他对该党的计划。

example.ex: Responsibility and moderation were to be the keynotes of their foreign policy.
example.tran: 责任和克制将是他们外交政策的核心。

means.word_mean: 1. the principal theme in a speech or literary work
3. (music) the first note of a diatonic scale
2. give the keynote address to (an audience)
